resultStatus.description:
The result status. Valid values are:

S: indicates that the result status is successful.
F: indicates that the result status is failed. 
U: indicates that the result status is unknown.

currency.description:
The 3-letter currency code that follows the ISO 4217 standard. 

More information:

Maximum length: 3 characters

value.description:
The value of the amount as a positive integer in the smallest currency unit. For example, if the currency is USD and the amount is $1.00, set the value of this parameter to 100; or if the currency is JPY and the amount is ￥1, set the value of this parameter to 1.  

For details about the smallest currency unit, see Smallest unit of the currency .

For details about the minimum payment amount allowed for each payment method, see Minimum amount rules. 

Note: Due to the currency practices in Indonesia, when the currency is IDR, round the amount with banker's rounding and fix the last two digits of this parameter as 00.  

More information:

Value range: 0 - unlimited

region.description:
The 2-letter country or region code. For more information, see the ISO 3166 Country Codes standard. 

More information:

Maximum length: 2 characters

state.description:
The state, country, or province name. 

For card payments, if your business entity is in the United States, and the card issuing country is Canada, the United States, or the United Kingdom, set the value to a region code that consists of two to three characters and follows the ISO 3166-2 standard. 

More information:

Maximum length: 8 characters

city.description:
The city, district, suburb, town, or village name. 

More information:

Maximum length: 32 characters

address1.description:
Address line 1, for example, the street address, PO box, and company name. 

More information:

Maximum length: 256 characters

address2.description:
Address line 2, for example, the apartment, suite, unit, and building information. 

More information:

Maximum length: 256 characters

zipCode.description:
The ZIP or postal code. 

For card payments, if your business entity is in the United States, specify this parameter according to the following parameter value requirements:

Only contains numbers, letters, hyphens, and spaces.
Must be within ten characters. 
More information:

Maximum length: 32 characters

firstName.description:
First name.

More information:

Maximum length: 32 characters

middleName.description:
Middle name

More information:

Maximum length: 32 characters

lastName.description:
Last name

More information:

Maximum length: 32 characters

fullName.description:
Full name

More information:

Maximum length: 128 characters

cardActiveTime.description: If not present, It will be activated when the card is created. Datetime UTC time: 2018-10-31T00:00:00+0800 ISO 8601

allowedMerchantCategoryList.description: Allowed MCC (Merchant Category Code) list. If not set or left empty, all transactions are allowed.

allowedAuthTimes.description: Indicates the number of allowed authorization times. If not set or left empty, all transactions are allowed.

allowedCurrencies.description: Allowed transaction currencies (ISO 4217 three-letter codes). If not set, no currency restriction applies.

remainingLimit.description:
剩余额度。
Remaining available limit.

rangeLimit.description:
剩余额度。
Remaining available limit.

usedLimit.description:
剩余额度。
Remaining available limit.

perTransactionLimit.description:
剩余额度。
Remaining available limit.

dailyLimit.description:
日最大限额。
Daily spending maximum limit.

monthlyLimit.description:
日最大限额。
Daily spending maximum limit.

perCardLimit.description:
日最大限额。
Daily spending maximum limit.

cardHolderName.description: The name of the card holder.

firstName.description: The first name of the card holder.

lastName.description: The last name of the card holder.

region.description: Region (e.g., state code or ISO region)

address1.description: Address line 1, such as the building name, room number and business name.

address2.description: Address line 2, such as the apartment or unit number.

address3.description: Address line 3, such as the street name.

result.description: Represents the result of the interface call

cardNickName.description:
由用户定义的卡昵称，可以帮助用户更方便地管理多张卡。
User-defined card nickname, designed to help users manage multiple cards more conveniently.

cardStatus.description:
卡状态。可取值范围：
ACTIVE：可正常使用
FROZEN：已冻结
CANCEL：已注销

Card Status: Represents the current state of the card. Possible values include:  
ACTIVE: The card is active and can be used normally.  
FROZEN: The card has been frozen and cannot be used temporarily.  
CANCEL: The card has been canceled and is no longer valid.

maskedCardNo.description:
脱敏卡号。
Masked card number.

cardBrand.description:
卡品牌。
可取值范围：
MASTERCARD

Card Brand: Indicates the brand or network of the card. Possible value:  
MASTERCARD: The card is part of the Mastercard network.

metadata.description:
Customer metadata in key-value format.
- Key max length: 32
- Value max length: 128
- Max number of keys: 30
- Total JSON string max length: 3096
